MissionEmpty_MissionText.speaker: UI
MissionEmpty_MissionText.text:
Try taking on some of my trials.

I'll toss something nice your way
for each one you complete.

MissionNew_MissionText.speaker: UI
MissionNew_MissionText.text:
Some new trials have been unlocked.

Take a look through the list
to see what's available.

Mission_0001_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0001_MissionDescription.text: Deal critical damage to an enemy using a type of attack to which they are vulnerable.

Mission_0001_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0001_MissionText.text:
The amount of damage you deal to an
adversary will increase if you use
attack types to which they are
vulnerable. Exploit your enemies'
vulnerabilities!

Mission_0011_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0011_MissionDescription.text: Defeat an enemy by exploiting their vulnerabilities.

Mission_0011_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0011_MissionText.text:
The amount of damage you deal to an
adversary will increase if you use
attack types to which they are
vulnerable. Exploit your enemies'
vulnerabilities!

Mission_0021_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0021_MissionDescription.text: Use a conditional tech to disrupt an enemy's combo.

Mission_0031_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0031_MissionText.text:
When attempting to quell a
conditional, do all you can
to not accidentally activate
an interrupt in the process.
Interrupts occur in response
to specific attack types.

Mission_0041_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0041_MissionDescription.text: Defeat an enemy before they act.

Mission_0041_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0041_MissionText.text:
Some say fortune favors the bold.
I say fortune favors whoever happens
to be fastest on the trigger!

Mission_0051_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0051_MissionText.text:
There are many ways to raise your
combo rate, but the easiest is to
get more of your team involved.
Some formations are better suited
to setting up United Attacks,
so try making use of them.

Mission_0052_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0052_MissionText.text:
To aim for greater heights,
you must first learn all the ways
you can raise your combo rate.
Make good use of additional combo,
vanquish, vengeance, and capture
bonuses that can be activated when
performing United Attacks.

Mission_0061_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0061_MissionDescription.text: Emerge victorious without anyone in your retinue becoming incapacitated.

Mission_0061_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0061_MissionText.text:
If you know the enemy and yourself,
you need not fear the result of
a hundred battles.

Mission_0071_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0071_MissionDescription.text: Defeat two or more enemies at once.

Mission_0071_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0071_MissionText.text:
There is no success to be found
in attacking enemies at random.
Keep a close eye on how much
HP your opponents have left.

Mission_0072_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0072_MissionDescription.text: Defeat three or more enemies at once.

Mission_0072_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0072_MissionText.text:
Managing your enemies' HP will be
more important now than ever before.

You'll need to pay close attention
if you plan to pull this one off.

Mission_0081_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0081_MissionDescription.text: Capture part of your enemies' combo range to create your own combo.

Mission_0081_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0081_MissionText.text:
Only a combo can capture part of
another combo's effective range.
Pay close attention to the timeline.

Mission_0091_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0091_MissionText.text:
Sometimes the best offense is a good defense.

There are times when minimizing
damage taken is more important
than dealing damage yourself.

Mission_0101_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0101_MissionDescription.text: Disrupt the chanting of an enemy's spell.

Mission_0101_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0101_MissionText.text:
Enemies are defenseless while
chanting. If you see someone
attempting to cast a spell,
focus on taking them out.

Mission_0111_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0111_MissionDescription.text: Stop an enemy's action with a stun or paralysis effect.

Mission_0111_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0111_MissionText.text:
Enemies are more vulnerable to status
ailments when their HP is low.
Remember that fact well!

Mission_0121_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0121_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 3x combo using a chain.

Mission_0121_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0121_MissionText.text:
Chain techs have a combo range
of <emoji CoopRange05>, but there are clever
ways to work them into combos.

Mission_0122_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0122_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 4x combo using a chain.

Mission_0122_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0122_MissionText.text:
Chain techs have a combo range
of <emoji CoopRange05>, but there are clever
ways to work them into combos.

Mission_0131_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0131_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 3x combo using a counterattack.

Mission_0131_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0131_MissionText.text:
Working a counterattack into
a combo is something that
requires careful thought.

Mission_0132_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0132_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 2x combo using a counterattack.

Mission_0132_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0132_MissionText.text:
A character who performs a
counterattack will be placed
behind their target on the
timeline. Take a moment to
predict how things will play
out on the timeline while
planning your strategy.

Mission_0141_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0141_MissionDescription.text: Use a showstopper to defeat the final enemy in a battle.

Mission_0141_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0141_MissionText.text:
Performing a showstopper isn't
difficult once you grasp how
to get one going.

Mission_0151_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0151_MissionDescription.text: Defeat an enemy with an interrupt.

Mission_0151_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0151_MissionText.text:
All techs possess certain attack types.
Should you wish to perform a
successful interrupt, you must
remain keenly aware of the attack
type being used by your foes.

Mission_0161_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0161_MissionDescription.text: Activate three allied or enemy combos in a single turn.

Mission_0161_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0161_MissionText.text:
The key to this challenge is to set up
as many small United Attacks as
possible, be it for yourself or for the
enemy. Think hard about how to
organize yourself along the timeline.

Mission_0162_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0162_MissionDescription.text: Activate four allied and/or enemy combos in a single turn.

Mission_0162_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0162_MissionText.text:
The key to this challenge is to set
up as many small combos as possible.
Think hard about how to organize
yourself along the timeline.

Mission_0171_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0171_MissionDescription.text: Defeat two or more enemies with a single combo.

Mission_0171_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0171_MissionText.text:
Start by lowering your enemies' HP,
then set up a combo to take them
out all at once.

Mission_0172_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0172_MissionDescription.text: Defeat three or more enemies with a single combo.

Mission_0172_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0172_MissionText.text:
Succeeding in this trial will require
deft management of your enemies' HP.

Mission_0181_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0181_MissionDescription.text: Defeat two or more enemies with a single showstopper.

Mission_0181_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0181_MissionText.text:
Lower your enemies' HP,
then unleash a showstopper
to remember.

Mission_0182_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0182_MissionDescription.text: Defeat three or more enemies with a single showstopper.

Mission_0182_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0182_MissionText.text:
Overcoming this trial will require
careful timeline management.
I look forward to seeing what
kind of answer you come up with.

Mission_0191_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0191_MissionDescription.text: Defeat an enemy with a counterattack.

Mission_0191_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0191_MissionText.text:
Being in an enemy's sights can
actually be the perfect chance
to put them down. Make your
foes do the hard work for you!

Mission_0201_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0201_MissionDescription.text: Activate two interrupts in a row.

Mission_0201_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0201_MissionText.text:
Interrupts can themselves be interrupted.

Take good stock of enemy actions
when plotting your next move.

Mission_0221_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0221_MissionDescription.text: Defeat an enemy with poison damage.

Mission_0221_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0221_MissionText.text:
Weaken an enemy you've already
poisoned and let the toxin take
care of the rest.

Mission_0231_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0231_MissionDescription.text: Defeat an enemy with a tech that has race-specific effectiveness.

Mission_0231_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0231_MissionText.text:
Not very many techs have increased
effectiveness against specific races,
but combat will be a smoother
experience if you learn and use
them well.

Mission_0241_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0241_MissionDescription.text: Defeat all the enemies using just the firstmost character in your lineup.

Mission_0241_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0241_MissionText.text:
One plan would be to have your
retinue soften up the opposition
and have the firstmost character
finish them off.

Mission_0251_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0251_MissionDescription.text: Defeat all the enemies using just the backmost character in your lineup.

Mission_0251_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0251_MissionText.text:
One plan would be to have your
retinue soften up the opposition
and have the backmost character
finish them off.

Mission_0261_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0261_MissionDescription.text: End a combo with a spell.

Mission_0261_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0261_MissionText.text:
Make sure to keep allies placed
near your spellcasters.

Mission_0271_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0271_MissionDescription.text: Defeat the final enemy in a battle with an Overdrive combo.

Mission_0271_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0271_MissionText.text:
This shouldn't be all that difficult
to pull off, provided you can set up
a situation where you're guaranteed
to enter Overdrive.

Mission_0281_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0281_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0281_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0281_MissionText.text:
Keep a close eye on your enemies'
HP and wait for the perfect moment
to use Unleash.

Mission_0282_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0282_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0282_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0282_MissionText.text:
Keep a close eye on your enemies'
HP and wait for the perfect moment
to use Unleash.

Mission_0291_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0291_MissionDescription.text: Stop a mech enemy's action with a mech stun or mech paralysis.

Mission_0291_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0291_MissionText.text:
Enemies are more vulnerable to status
ailments when their HP is low.
Remember this fact well.

Mission_0901_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0901_MissionDescription.text: Deal 100 damage or more with a single attack.

Mission_0901_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0901_MissionText.text:
Whether you choose to climb this hill
by conquering many trials or seeking
another path is up to you.

Mission_09011_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09011_MissionDescription.text: Deal 200 damage or more with a single attack.

Mission_09011_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09011_MissionText.text:
Whether you choose to climb this hill
by conquering many trials or seeking
another path is up to you.

Mission_09012_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09012_MissionDescription.text: Deal 300 damage or more with a single attack.

Mission_09012_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09012_MissionText.text:
You must aim for greater heights
than ever before.

Mission_09013_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09013_MissionDescription.text: Deal 400 damage or more with a single attack.

Mission_09013_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09013_MissionText.text:
Having come this far, I can't imagine
there's much advice you need from me.

Mission_09014_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09014_MissionDescription.text: Deal 500 damage or more with a single attack.

Mission_09014_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09014_MissionText.text:
May those who have mastered the art
of combat receive their just rewards.

Mission_0902_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0902_MissionDescription.text: Extend an enemy's chanting time by a total of two turns.

Mission_0902_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0902_MissionText.text:
Extending an adversary's chanting
time without defeating them will
require careful control of how
much damage you're dishing out.

Mission_0903_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0903_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory without letting your enemies act even once.

Mission_0903_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0903_MissionText.text:
Do everything in your power to
prevent your foes from acting.

Mission_0904_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0904_MissionDescription.text: Push an enemy back ten spaces in a single turn.

Mission_0904_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0904_MissionText.text:
An enemy can only be delayed
so much with a single attack.

...You see what I'm getting at, yes?

Mission_0905_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0905_MissionText.text: You'll need to carefully avoid your adversaries' conditional and delay techs.

Mission_0906_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0906_MissionText.text:
Try making use of formations
that facilitate the activation of
showstoppers.

Mission_0907_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0907_MissionDescription.text: Perform a combo over a range of ten spaces.

Mission_0907_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0907_MissionText.text:
This shouldn't prove too challenging if
you make clever use of formations and
techs that affect timeline placement.
Now show me what you're made of!

Mission_09071_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09071_MissionDescription.text: Perform a combo over a range of six spaces.

Mission_09071_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09071_MissionText.text:
This will require putting together
an extremely long combo.
A strong understanding of the
timeline is a must for this one.

Mission_0908_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0908_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 5x combo with no allies directly adjacent to each other.

Mission_0908_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0908_MissionText.text:
Highly deliberate positioning is one
way to approach this, but expanding
the combo range of your techs could
be another tactic.

Mission_0909_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0909_MissionDescription.text: Enter Overdrive two times in a row.

Mission_0909_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0909_MissionText.text:
It's difficult to raise your combo rate
while in overdrive, so make ample
use of the bonuses—vanquish
bonuses in particular—that can
activate during United Attacks.

Mission_0910_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0910_MissionDescription.text: Perform a combo with your retinue making up the first five spaces in the timeline.

Mission_0910_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0910_MissionText.text:
Techs are not the only way one can
manipulate the timeline.

I suggest you take a good look at
your formation and roles as well.

Mission_0911_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0911_MissionDescription.text: Perform a combo with your retinue making up the last five spaces in the timeline.

Mission_0911_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0911_MissionText.text:
Techs are not the only way one
can manipulate the timeline.
I suggest you take a good look at
your formation and roles as well,
and if all else fails, consider
equipping something heavy.

Mission_0912_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0912_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 4x combo using only spells.

Mission_0912_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0912_MissionText.text:
This trial requires you to align
when your spells will activate,
while also ensuring no one in the
process of chanting is disturbed.

Mission_09121_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09121_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 2x combo using only spells.

Mission_09121_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09121_MissionText.text:
This trial cannot be conquered unless
you go to great lengths to defend
any in your retinue that are chanting.

Mission_09122_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09122_MissionDescription.text: Perform a 3x combo using only spells.

Mission_09122_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09122_MissionText.text:
This trial requires you to align
when your spells will activate,
while also ensuring no one in the
process of chanting is disturbed.

Mission_0913_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0913_MissionText.text:
If only there was some tech
capable of removing frenzy...

Mission_0914_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0914_MissionDescription.text: Perform a United Attack after removing the stench status.

Mission_0914_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0914_MissionText.text:
This trial will not be considered
achieved unless stench is removed
and a United Attack is performed on
the same turn. Consider the situation
well before making your move.

Mission_0915_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0915_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0915_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0915_MissionText.text:
Keep a close eye on your enemies'
HP and wait for the perfect moment
to use Unleash.

Mission_0916_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0916_MissionText.text:
Enemies are more vulnerable to status
ailments when their HP is low.
Remember this fact well.

Mission_0918_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0918_MissionDescription.text: Defeat all enemies using sudden-death techs.

Mission_0918_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0918_MissionText.text:
Enemies are more vulnerable to status
ailments when their HP is low.
Remember this fact well.

Mission_0919_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0919_MissionDescription.text: Apply two or more status-ailment icons to an enemy.

Mission_0919_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0919_MissionText.text:
This trial requires keeping a foe
alive long enough to afflict them
with multiple status ailments.

Mission_0923_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0923_MissionText.text:
The key to overcoming this trial lies
in creating situations that force your
adversaries to target characters of
your own choosing.

Mission_0924_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0924_MissionDescription.text: Have an ally move from one end of the timeline to the other.

Mission_0924_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0924_MissionText.text:
Only one with a true mastery of
timeline placement and movement
could hope to become as lightning
traveling across the field of battle.

Mission_0925_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0925_MissionDescription.text: Have all spaces in the timeline colored at the start of a turn.

Mission_0925_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0925_MissionText.text:
The ultimate timeline challenge,
suitable for one who has attained
true mastery in all things related
to the workings of the timeline.

Mission_0927_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0927_MissionDescription.text: Emerge victorious with five people having taken no damage.

Mission_0927_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0927_MissionText.text:
Haste is all with an objective
like this, and defense meaningless.
The best way to stay safe is to
strike hard and fast.

Mission_09271_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09271_MissionDescription.text: Emerge victorious with two people having taken no damage.

Mission_09271_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09271_MissionText.text:
Claim victory while keeping
your allies safe and sound.

Mission_09272_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09272_MissionDescription.text: Emerge victorious with three people having taken no damage.

Mission_09272_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09272_MissionText.text:
Claim victory while keeping
your allies safe and sound.

Mission_0928_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0928_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory without performing any actions on the first or second turns.

Mission_0928_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0928_MissionText.text:
You'll be giving your opponent a fairly
hefty advantage, so only do this
against foes you're sure you can handle.

Mission_0929_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0929_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory using only conditional techs.

Mission_0929_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0929_MissionText.text:
Only one who demonstrates an
exceptional understanding of
conditional techs can hope to
triumph over this trial.

Mission_0930_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0930_MissionText.text:
Only one who demonstrates an
exceptional understanding of
spells can hope to triumph
over this trial.

Mission_0931_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0931_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory using only techs that cost 1 BP or less.

Mission_0931_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0931_MissionText.text:
Make ample use of every option
you have to decrease BP costs.

Mission_0932_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0932_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory using only techs that cost 4 or more BP.

Mission_0932_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0932_MissionText.text:
Choose your opponents wisely
for this particular trial.

Mission_09321_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09321_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory using only techs that cost 2 or more BP.

Mission_09321_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09321_MissionText.text:
You'll need to find a way to emerge
victorious while limiting yourself
to the most BP-hungry techs in
your arsenal.

Mission_09322_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09322_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory using only techs that cost 3 or more BP.

Mission_09322_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09322_MissionText.text:
You'll need to find a way to emerge
victorious while limiting yourself
to the most BP-hungry techs in
your arsenal.

Mission_0933_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0933_MissionText.text:
You'll need to think up a strategy
that closes things out quickly.

Mission_09331_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_09331_MissionDescription.text: Claim victory in a single turn.

Mission_09331_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_09331_MissionText.text:
There are some things that cannot
be accomplished on one's own.
Choose your opponent wisely.

Mission_0935_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0935_MissionDescription.text: Emerge from an enemy combo unscathed.

Mission_0935_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0935_MissionText.text:
This trial will prove difficult unless
your enemies have their sights set
on a single target.

Mission_0936_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0936_MissionDescription.text: Emerge unscathed from an enemy attack that targets your entire party.

Mission_0936_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0936_MissionText.text:
I imagine this will be a tall order
for those who keep a large number
of allies in their retinue.

Mission_0937_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0937_MissionDescription.text: Defeat six or more enemies in a single battle.

Mission_0937_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0937_MissionText.text:
Summoned enemies act immediately
upon joining the fight, so you'll
want to keep your wits about you.

Mission_0938_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0938_MissionDescription.text: Defeat two or more enemies with an enemy's tech.

Mission_0938_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0938_MissionText.text:
Rumor has it there exist foes that
devour their own allies for nourishment.
Should you have the good fortune
to encounter one, do not let that
rare opportunity pass you by.

Mission_0917_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0917_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0920_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0920_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0921_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0921_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0922_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0922_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0926_MissionDescription.speaker: UI
Mission_0926_MissionDescription.text: Use Unleash to defeat an enemy monster and then absorb it.

Mission_0021_MissionText.speaker: UI
Mission_0021_MissionText.text:
There's more than one way to disrupt
an enemy's United Attack. Consider
the properties of conditionals such as
interrupts, pursuits, and
counterattacks, and make strategic
use of them.

HP and wait for the perfect moment
to use Unleash.
